manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, ornate chandelier hanging from the center of the ceiling, casting realistic shadows.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the flags and stands on the left side of the frame, blending the background seamlessly.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background visible through the windows with a tropical beach scene, matching light direction.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain streaks on the windows, darkening the room and creating reflections on surfaces.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the material of the wooden desks to a vibrant, polished marble, reflecting light realistically.
